content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

0->1->3->4->7->6->5->0

This is the shortest path from node 1 to node 0 in the given graph. Please note that the edges are represented as an array of tuples, where each tuple represents a connection between two nodes. Here, the path traverses nodes 1, 3, 4, 7, 6, and 5 to reach node 0.

0->1->3->6

This is the shortest path from node 1 to node 5 in the given graph. Please note that the edges are represented as an array of tuples, where each tuple represents a connection between two nodes. Here, the path traverses nodes 1, 3, and 6 to reach node 5.
